statements: SELECT * FROM international_properties_sales;
SELECT property_name, sale_price, buyer_name FROM international_properties_sales;
SELECT property_name, location, sale_date FROM international_properties_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT property_id, seller_name, sale_date FROM international_properties_sales WHERE buyer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM international_properties_sales WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%';
SELECT property_id, property_name, location, sale_date, sale_price, buyer_name, seller_name FROM international_properties_sales;
SELECT * FROM international_properties_sales WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, sale_price FROM international_properties_sales WHERE location = 'Paris' AND sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT DISTINCT buyer_name, seller_name FROM international_properties_sales WHERE location IN ('New York', 'London') AND sale_price BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000;
SELECT property_name, sale_price, sale_date FROM international_properties_sales WHERE property_name LIKE '%villa%' ORDER BY property_name ASC, sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, location, sale_price FROM properties WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT property_id, property_type, location FROM properties WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT property_name, sale_price, sale_date FROM properties ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type, location FROM properties WHERE sale_price < 50000;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_type, location FROM properties WHERE location LIKE '%City%' OR location LIKE '%Town%' ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, sale_price FROM properties WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT buyer_name, buyer_country, sale_price FROM sales_data WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY buyer_name ASC, sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, location, sale_price, sale_date FROM properties p JOIN sales_data s ON p.property_id = s.property_id WHERE s.buyer_country = 'USA' ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, property_location, sale_price FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_location, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, sale_price FROM sales_data ORDER BY property_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE nationality='USA' AND LENGTH(owner_name) > 5;
SELECT AVG(sale_price) AS average_sale_price FROM sales_data;
SELECT property_name, property_location, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT trend_description, trend_value FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2021-01-01' AND trend_value < 100000 ORDER BY trend_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, sale_price FROM properties WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM buyers ORDER BY buyer_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY city;
SELECT buyer_name, email FROM buyers WHERE country='Canada' AND city='Toronto';
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE country = 'USA' AND sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, country, city, sale_price FROM properties WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_price DESC;

SELECT buyers.buyer_name, properties.property_name, transactions.sale_price FROM buyers JOIN transactions ON buyers.buyer_id = transactions.buyer_id JOIN properties ON transactions.property_id = properties.property_id WHERE buyers.country = 'Canada';
SELECT property_name AS Name, city AS Location, sale_price AS Price, sale_date AS SaleDate FROM properties WHERE property_id = 5;

SELECT properties.property_name, market_performance.market_value, market_performance.valuation_date FROM properties JOIN market_performance ON properties.property_id = market_performance.property_id ORDER BY market_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT property_name, location, sale_price FROM sales_data WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT property_name, location, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_size, currency FROM sales_data WHERE property_size > 500 AND currency = 'USD';
SELECT agent_name, agency_name FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, location, sale_price FROM sales_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY sale_price DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' AND sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_price ASC
SELECT property_name, location, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE property_size > 2000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT property_name, location, property_size, currency FROM sales_data WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY property_size ASC
SELECT owner_name, contact_information, property_name FROM property_owners INNER JOIN sales_data ON property_owners.property_id = sales_data.property_id ORDER BY owner_name
